name: Douglas Odell
byline: User experience-driven front-end web developer, technology strategist, and team leader

entries.title: Front End Application Developer
accomplishments: Developed intuitive, responsive, and maintainable web apps using modern JavaScript libraries and coding practices in an Agile/SCRUM environment
Created shared React component library for front-end assets to enable UI consistency across various apps and websites
Migrated corporate website from legacy .NET app to CMS-supported prospecting tool using Contentful, Netlify, and GatsbyJS
Implemented closed-loop analytics between custom web apps and Hubspot properties using Google Analytics and Hubspot CRM
Contributed to design and development of networking app for financial professionals to connect based on common interests using React
Enhanced user experience for CMS platforms including Contentful, OpenText WMS, and SharePoint Online

entries.title: Freelance Web Developer/Designer
accomplishments: Designed and developed CMS-supported brochure websites for small businesses using Wordpress, Wix, and Squarespace
Consulted on user experience, design, and implementation for small business websites

entries.title: Supervisor, Web Services & Usability
accomplishments: Led website development and maintenance strategy for client portal, employee intranet, and corporate website
Managed, mentored, hired, and professionally supported team of front-end developers
Supported team through corporate restructuring, rebuilding the team while ensuring ongoing support of websites and applications
Coordinated work for a high-volume Kanban queue and long-term Agile/SCRUM project pipeline
Consulted on UX for intranet and HRIS replacement projects

entries.title: Web Production Specialist
accomplishments: Administered content updates for client portal, employee intranet, employee directory and corporate website
Provided indispensable customer service to internal clients through a high-volume web request queue (ServiceNow)
Collaborated with business to find creative solutions to improve website engagement, incorporating UX and development best practices
Migrated frequently-updated static websites into CMS to enable self-serve maintenance for content authors
Developed front-end interfaces for web tools and applications with usability and coding best practices
